alternativeNames: Bilaj, Vira Yosypivna; Bilaj, Vera Iosifovna
examples: Fusarium sporotrichiella Bilaĭ in Yadovitye griby na zerne khlebnykh zlakov (Poisonous fungi on cereal seed), Kiev: 86. 1953. nom. inval.
source: CMI. Alternative names and year of death from Alexander Doweld (IFPNI). Name published from Index Fungorum.
